title: Which chapter of physics class 11 are required for the class 12 physics NEET prep? - Quora

response.answer_text: Look physics is more about calculations and also for different laws because in physics more you have to focus on Formula and derivations of that. Physics is tough for bio students as I have noticed   As you can see in this graph each and every topic and chapter has its own weightage for the exam and most probably it's common for all including boards Jee and NEET as well. You have many certain options for that like you have Toppr: the better learning app which provides complete free video tutorial for Physics and it helps you understand clearly for the preparation including all imp topics and chapters. I hope my answer helps you. Thank you ❤️ All the best 👍 Keep learning 📝

Hello I hope you are doing good Gravitation is equivalent to electrostatics. 80% of formulas are same.. So you should do gravitation.. Thermodynamics and ktg.. Thermodynamics is one of most important chapters.. Will be used in few chapters.
